channel.title: Npcs talking
channel.description: Hello, im new to coding 508s and i need some help, i have an npc were i want him to be but, i want him to say something like ( type ::home to get to home.) something like that can you tell me were i put the npc at like were is the file. thanks

item.title: Npcs talking
item.dc:creator: @ownageunited ownageunited
item.description:
@ownageunited wrote:

im using 508z source to make my new 508 and i did it for mine
go to npcoption1.java

[code]if(pnp.npcType == 6166)
{

if(p.Quests == 0)
{
p.Dialogue = 4444;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 6166, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Sir Pelleas”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Hello.”, 241, 4);
}[/code]

thats what i did

Read full topic
